name: Dynatrace
description: Dynatrace is a software intelligence platform that provides monitoring and analytics for applications and infrastructure in real-time.

options.name: Environment ID
options.description: The Dynatrace Environment ID to use for API requests. This can be found in the URL when logged into Dynatrace. For example, if the URL is https://abc123.live.dynatrace.com/#home, the environment ID is abc123.

options.name: Dynatrace apiKey
options.description: A Dynatrace Public Token which can be created from the Dynatrace web interface by going to "Settings -> Integration -> Dynatrace API".

options.name: DQL/ Log Search
options.description: Dynatrace Search Query to execute. The string `{{ENTITY}}` will be replaced by the looked up indicator. For example: host.name:{{ENTITY}} or process_group_name:{{ENTITY}}. If left blank, the search query will default to host.name:{{ENTITY}}.
